items.title: A Book of Endless Spells
items.description: A dusty, leather-bound tome that, when opened, reveals an infinite number of pages, each filled with incomprehensible symbols.

items.title: An Ever-Ticking Clock
items.description: A small clock on the wall that ticks out of sync with time itself, sometimes moving backwards or skipping minutes.

items.title: A Glowing Orb
items.description: A faintly glowing, pulsating crystal orb floating in the center of the room. It feels warm to the touch.

items.title: A Caged Glimmer
items.description: A small, delicate glass cage containing a single, captured wisp of starlight that flits about restlessly.

items.title: A Jar of Floating Eyes
items.description: A preserved jar on a shelf contains several small, detached eyeballs that slowly drift around, blinking occasionally.
